archimate:ImplementationEvent.name: 21.11.2023 - Met with Vesa Vatka
archimate:ImplementationEvent.documentation:
Sami Aura and Mattias Dahlberg met with Vesa Vatka on the topic of the IAM processes.
The main from the meeting were: • 5000-6000 accounts with access to UMN (has to be reviewed by two product owners, which is not feasible) • Periodical reviews are not being performed ○ The number of approvers are too few § Approvers can't manage the reviews within the 40 day window § Since the users risk losing their access after the deadline, the reviews are skipped • Accountability for System Access is missing • Attempts to establish accountability with Line Managers have been rejected by HR
